name: flame-burst
flavor_text: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect_text_simple: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
